name: kyatsujs
description: A cool discord.js assistant to create bots in a simple way. Bye bye laborious tasks !

scripts.save: git add src/ && git add lib/
scripts.build: npm run run-builder && tsc && npm run prettier && npm run save
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && git commit -m "[AUTO] Build"
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && git push && npm publish && git push --tags
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && git push && npm publish && git push --tags
scripts.publish-major: npm version major && git push && npm publish && git push --tags
scripts.tdoc: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out docs src/index.ts --hideBreadcrumbs true && node doc-builder.js

author: Elouann Hosta
